ğŸ¦ Loan Approval Prediction System



An **end-to-end Supervised Machine Learning project** for predicting loan approval outcomes using applicant data. The project follows a complete ML workflow, from data exploration to model evaluation.

Built multiple **binary classification models** to determine loan approval, focusing on **EDA, feature engineering, and evaluation metrics** relevant to financial decision-making.

ğŸ§  Models Used

* K-Nearest Neighbors (KNN)
* Logistic Regression
* Naive Bayes

ğŸ“Š Evaluation Metrics

* Precision
* Recall
* F1-score
